overview: Prerequisites for the core subjects in the Middle Years Programme specialisation:
1. EDUC90333 Introduction to the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90968 Curriculum Frameworks in the IB MYP
2. EDUC90331 Assessment & Reporting in the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90969 IB MYP Advanced

Structure: Completion of all of the following subjects:

Structure.EDUC90968: Curriculum Frameworks in the IB MYP Credits
Structure.EDUC90331: Assessment & Reporting in the IB Credits
